Posts.Title: help with information on hormone neg and her neg

Posts.Content: hi im 52 years old was diagnosed in oct 2006 had lumpectomy and was told have grade 2 cancer they removed 5 lymphnodes and 1 was positive i am on my 4th round of chemo ( fec ) 2 more to go then will get 4 weeks radiotherapy the oncologist says im hormone neg and her neg i have no idea what that means she says its good but will be two weeks before i can ask again so would like to know can any of you out there enlighten me. I have had no problems with chemotherapy have kept really well and am very positive and hopefully all will be well with me We all want to know if we will make it but all we can do is hope Good luck to all you out there suffering with this disease i pray for us all
Posts.Title: help with information on hormone neg and her neg

Posts.Content: hi i had breast cancer and am needle phobic especially to a cannula, so I had a pic line put in, inserted in my arm i recommend to anyone it was great i had no problems at all and no collaspsed viens or bruising talk to your team about it good luck with your treatment keep positive
Posts.Title: chemo port?

Posts.Content: i have not been on for a while its a year since i finished all my treatments i occasionally have pain in the breast i had op on is this normal im woriied
Posts.Title: is the pain normal

Posts.Content: hi have breast cancer stage 2 ,51 at diagnosis. hormone neg and her neg have had 6 lots of )FEC) chemo last treatment finished on 5th May radiotherapy starts end of May .MY question is my friend has chicken pox and i have been in contact with her should i phone and let my doctor know in case i should get shingles i am a bit worried now as i have just finished my chemo and this could really set me back, has this happened to anyone else ? Thanks again for all feedback i get on this site and god bless everyone who is going through this terrible thing
Posts.Title: shingles and cancer

Posts.Content: hi re shingles thankyou again for your replys your always appreciated input and your concern. My husband works abroad and is not home much during this treatment so im going it alone ,but have friends and family around but this site sure helps with questions im concerned about Knowing you are out there and can empathise with me, My oncology team said that there was not much we could do until i show symtoms which would include a rash and possible pain under my ribcage and maybe in my face its been two weeks now since my contact they said maybe three weeks or so I feel good at the moment long may it continue have finished chemo start radiotherapy in June god bless us all and keep us well Rose 8 breast cancer grade 2 hormone neg on chemo( fec) 18 wks and radiotherapy 20 sessions soon to start
Posts.Title: shingles and cancer

Posts.Content: hi jelly donut I am new to this too found it interesting thet 20 years of premarin and you had lumectomy i was on it for 14 years just had lumectomy stage 2 cancer with cell in my lymph node had 3 chemo already half way mark and the radiotherapy im doing okay and had very little side affects apart from losing my hair I keep cheery and just soldier on but always looking for reasons why i got it. Good luck to you and i send prayers to all our cancer friends
Posts.Title: New Here, just saying hello

Posts.Content: hi everyone its been a while since i last posted anything have finished all my treatments and now my hair growing in different colour and texture but hey at least its back and with it came my confindence which i had lost for a while there . I now have mastitis which in my ignorance thought you only got that with breastfeeding and im well past all that Its in the breast I had my lumectomy i have antibiotic for it had it now for a month its swollen and sore i see my surgeon on the 9th Nov so I hope all is okay you cant help but worry about changes there now and i wonder has anyone else suffered this grade 2 cancer tumor 2 cm her neg lumectomy in nov 2006 chemo and radiotherapy all done by july 2007
Posts.Title: mastitis and breast cancer??

Posts.Content: breast cancer in left breast diagnosed Oct 06 aged 51 had lumpectomy in Nov 2006 followed by chemotherapy FEC and then 20 rads tumour 1.5cm stage two cancer with node involvement also early menapause due to hysterectomy on premarin for 13 years her is triple negs I feel good most of time but have pain in breast i had op in and sore to touch sometimes is this normal had my check up in July doctor said it could be tissue and nerve pain has anyone else had this thats one year and half since my op im worried also get really tired sometimes lately Im diabetic on insulin and always tend to blame my diabetes on everything Its a battle to keep spirits up every day for everyone but every day i see the sun up is a good day for me thanks again for this site you are all inspiring and amazing
Posts.Title: oops forgot to add my info sorry its been a while

Posts.Content: i do hope by now you have had results and that they were all ok A lot of the symtoms can be stress of worry I got told I had breast cancer and i could not walk with the pain in my back and the pain stayed with me till they told me what was to happen to me so we can let our imagination run away with us and it can do horrible things to us so keep positive and the very best of luck to you
Posts.Title: awaiting mammogram

Posts.Content: hi i to have breast cancer and just on my third chemo now 3 more to go and the followed by 4 weeks radiotherapy which they say is just an another precaution and possibly i will get tablets too i live alone and i know you must be worried but im coping okay with my chemo with very little side affects but im sure the radiotherapy in your sisters case is just another precaution good luck to her and to you its hard for family members that are away as you feel powerless phone up your local macmillian nurse or cancer centre they will help answer your questions
Posts.Title: Info on radiation please

Posts.Content: hi i have breast cancer grade2 had lumectomy and 5 nodes removed with one positive out of 5 , im hormone neg and her neg Im on my 4 th chemo and have been brilliant throughout i will get radiotherapy after my chemo i would like to know is there anything ie alternative remedys that i can use someone say green tes aloe vera juice and royal jelly anyone heard of this ??
Posts.Title: radiotherapy help

Posts.Content: hi im 51 have breast cancer and im on my 4th chemo i to get very breathless and im sure its the chemo as i was fine before i get sent for echocardiographs every now and then good luck to you, tell your doctor she may ease your worry by sending you to
Posts.Title: Shortness of breath

Posts.Content: i have lost my hair from my chemotherapy how long does it take to grow back in and will the radiotherapy affect it at all
Posts.Title: hair loss due to chemotherapy
